channel.title: NPC help
channel.description:
How do i make an npc act aggressive only when attacked? and how do i make an npc not get stacked or be able to walk through walls?
Thanks -I_AM_LEGEND[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 06:01:27 pm[/size][hr]oh and still have a timer issue if someone could quicker resolve that.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 07:39:30 pm[/size][hr]I FIXED THE TIMER SITUATION JUST NEED HELP WITH NPC MILD AGGRESSIVENESS.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 06, 2009, 07:57:03 pm[/size][hr]you know what im just going to go to another website..no one ever helps me on this website.
